alert.note: Alert for Clark (Nevada) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LasVegas (Southern Nevada, Southeastern California, Northwestern Arizona)
info.headline: Flood Advisory issued September 01 at 7:28AM PDT until September 01 at 8:15AM PDT by NWS LasVegas
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 AM PDT THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall continues. * WHERE...A portion of southern Nevada, including the following county, Clark. * WHEN...Until 900 AM PDT. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. Ponding of water in urban or other areas is occurring or is imminent. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 727 AM PDT, Doppler radar indicated fast moving thunderstorms producing heavy rain along Boulder Highway in east central Las Vegas. Minor flooding is already occurring along Boulder Highway. Between 0.25 and 0.5 inches of rain have fallen. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Las Vegas, North Las Vegas, East Las Vegas, Nellis AFB, Paradise, The Strip, The Motor Speedway. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Be aware of your surroundings and do not drive on flooded roads.
